```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Aktualität der Tabelle

```{r}
gauge(indicator,  min = 0, max = 100, symbol = '%', gaugeSectors(
  success = c(96, 100), warning = c(90, 95), danger = c(0, 89)
))

```
